verbs.description: another road loss for wolves as [ARG1: clippers] [V: pull] [ARG2: away at finish line] the wolves were frustrated with fouls called on them in the fourth quarter helping the clippers to stifle any chance of a wolves comeback staples center danilo gallinari rose jimmy butler clippers jimmy butler basketball los angeles boban marjanović wolves taj gibson boban marjanovic los angeles clippers patrick beverley
